beginDate.title: Begin Date
beginDate.description: The effective date of the warehouse tariff.

endDate.title: End Date
endDate.description: The day before the effective date of the new year.

receiving.title: Receiving
receiving.description: Receiving, tagging, weighing on arrival, drawing one set of samples, if requested, issuing warehouse receipts and placing in storage.

storageA.title: Storage
storageA.description: Each storage month or fractional part thereof, including fire insurance.

weighingAtShipment.title: Weighing at Shipment
weighingAtShipment.description: Weighing or reweighing, including removing cotton from and returning it to storage and furnishing original and three copies of certified weight sheets.

weighingFromStorage.title: Weighing From Storage
weighingFromStorage.description: Reweighing and resampling at time of shipment, per bale.

samplingAtShipment.title: Sampling at Shipment
samplingAtShipment.description: Sampling or resampling at time of shipment.

samplingFromStorage.title: Sampling From Storage
samplingFromStorage.description: Sampling or resampling, Including removing cotton from and returning it to storage.

additionalSampling.title: Additional Sampling
additionalSampling.description: Drawing an extra set of samples, at time of any sampling.

oneSideSamples.title: Samples From One Side
oneSideSamples.description: Samples from one side only, (not removing cotton from storage).

markOrBrand.title: Apply Mark or Brand
markOrBrand.description: Applying mark/brand (5 characters) on bagging without a patch.

additionalMarkOrBrand.title: Additional Marking or Branding
additionalMarkOrBrand.description: Additional marking/branding in excess of five (5) characters.

rehandling.title: Re-Handling
rehandling.description: Re-handling after breakout because of delayed pick up, cancellation of order, or for any other reason.

standardDelivery.title: Standard Delivery
standardDelivery.description: Standard Delivery, including picking out by tag number from storage, delivery to warehouse platform, six letter mark, and loading boxcars, trucks or containers.

expeditedOrders.title: Expedited Orders
expeditedOrders.description: Expedited orders (when expedited service is available).

cancelOrder.title: Cancellation of Order
cancelOrder.description: Charge for cancellation of order and return to stock after breakout.

delayedPickUp.title: Delayed Pick-Up
delayedPickUp.description: Delayed Pick-up: If cotton is not picked up by the 1st business day following the agreed scheduled pick-up date, a charge will be assessed. Storage will continue until the pick-up date. Cotton not picked-up within 10 days after the agreed scheduled pick-up date will be returned to stock and subject to a restocking fee, per bale.

patch.title: Application of Patch
patch.description: Includes application of patch where necessary.

density.title: Universal Density
density.description: Universal Density (8 ties and no patch).

extraCompression.title: Extra Compression
extraCompression.description: Extra compression charge - all bales weighing more than 600 pounds net.

deliveryOfSamples.title: Delivery of Samples
deliveryOfSamples.description: Delivery of samples or types by postage, freight or express carrier.

typing.title: Typing
typing.description: Typing - 25 pounds and under, and reweighing.

ranging.title: Ranging
ranging.description: Ranging for inspection and return to storage if necessary. (This charge not applicable in connection with any other service.)

handlingCotton.title: Handling Cotton
handlingCotton.description: Handling transit cotton for consolidation or any purpose other than compression (includes in and out handling and loading).

damagedCotton.title: Picking Damaged Cotton
damagedCotton.description: Reconditioning, Repairing plated, water packed or gin fall bales or picking damaged cotton.

consolidation.title: Consolidation
consolidation.description: Consolidation including unloading, checking and reloading to outbound conveyance.

matchingTags.title: Matching Special Tags
matchingTags.description: Matching special tags to bales by bale number.

segregating.title: Segregating Samples
segregating.description: Segregating samples by tag numbers, packaging and delivering locally or to carrier.

brushingOrBlowing.title: Brushing or Blowing
brushingOrBlowing.description: Reconditioning, Brushing and/or blowing dirt and/or sand off cotton at time of receipt or compression.

dryingCotton.title: Drying Cotton
dryingCotton.description: Reconditioning, Drying cotton received wet but undamaged.

handlingCharge.title: Handling Charge
handlingCharge.description: A handling charge will be made when shipping order is not picked up within 7 days of original ship date per bale.

moveShippingDate.title: Cancel or Move Shipping Date
moveShippingDate.description: Request to cancel or move ship date, must by made 14 days prior to original ship date. Failure to do so , charge per bale.

transitCotton.title: Transit Cotton
transitCotton.description: Transit cotton: Receiving, marking, storing, and loading by lot.

receipts.title: Receipts
receipts.description: Converting electronic receipts to paper receipts of paper receipts to electronic receipts.

surcharge.title: Surcharge
surcharge.description: Surcharge on orders containing 10 bales or less per order.

resale.title: Resale
resale.description: Resale of shipping order per side, with retention of agreed upon load date.

swapping.title: Swapping
swapping.description: Swapping of shipping order per bale on any shipping order swapped.

phytosanitary.title: Phytosanitary
phytosanitary.description: Phytosanitary Certificates of cotton for export.

flatbedTrucks.title: Flatbed Trucks
flatbedTrucks.description: Loading outbound flatbed trucks, per bale.

unloading.title: Unloading
unloading.description: Unloading, per request of truck line or shipper.

conversionOfOrders.title: Conversion of Shipping Orders
conversionOfOrders.description: Conversion of early shipping orders to complete shipping orders.

changeDate.title: Change of Pick-Up Date
changeDate.description: Changes in pickup date made less than 4 days prior to scheduled ship date will be considered late pickup.

lateCancel.title: Late Cancellation
lateCancel.description: Cancellation of order after scheduled ship date will be assessed a late fee in addition to a restocking fee.
